The rest of the paper will be organized as follows .In the Related work section , we briefly describe relevant works in biomedical hypotheses discovery and link mining .In the Hypotheses generation as supervised link discovery on biomedical concept network section , we formulate hypotheses generation from literature as link discovery in a concept network and further model the link discovery as a supervised learning process based on a set of topological and semantic features .

We also address the challenges involved in automatically generating labeled data and extracting heterogeneous features for a large number of labeled data using Map - Reduce framework .In the Experimental results section , we present experimental results .Finally , we conclude our paper with the Conclusions section .
